mapper.insert: insert into usertbl (email, username, photoURL, nickname, slackID, joinDate, address, address2, extension, workPhone, phone, coin, grade, workCondition) values (#{email},#{username},#{photoURL},#{nickname},#{slackID},#{joinDate},#{address},#{address2},#{extension},#{workPhone},#{phone},"1000","2", "재직")
mapper.select: select email, username, photoURL, slackID, coin, workCondition from usertbl where not email = #{email}
select email, username, photoURL, slackID, coin from usertbl;
